name: T - Nina Noelle
_source: speak;Noelle; I saw you steal something just now.
speak;Nina; Check your eyes, woman.{w} I didn't steal anything.
speak;Noelle; So this is the one they call the Lawbreaker{tgm}...

speak;Noelle; My father told me stories of when you would sneak into the castle he was stationed at.{w} He spoek of you always made fools of them,{w} how you could enter and exit the treasury like you owned the place.
speak;Nina; Wait, no I'm not!{w} You can't prove I stole anything!
speak;Noelle; Hey, wait!{w} Come back here!
